name: Laura Mercier Caviar Stick Eye Color Sugar Frost 1.64g/0.05oz

Description: A versatile and easy-to-use cream eye shadow stick that delivers effortless application, intense buildable color, up to 12-hour long lasting wear, and a range of pigment-rich shades in creamy shimmer and matte finishes. The Caviar Stick Eye Color glides smoothly onto lids, making it perfect for long-lasting, effortless eye makeup. name: Jessica London Women's Plus Size Stretch Knit V-Neck Swing Tunic
description:
Product: Jessica London Women's Plus Size Stretch Knit V-Neck Swing Tunic

Description: A versatile and stylish tunic with a V-neckline, short sleeves, and a trapeze silhouette that flatter every body type. The trapeze silhouette is perfect for everyday wear, and the short sleeves add a touch of elegance. The tunic is made of a blend of rayon and spandex, making it comfortable and breathable. The brand, Style To Live By, specializes in fashionable and affordable clothing for women.
